# 2018 Central African Republic League

The 2018 Central African Republic League season is the top level of football competition in Central African Republic.
Teams
A total of 12 teams participate in the Ligue de Bangui Premi√®re Division. The season started on 21 February 2018.
Halfway standings (18 June 2018): [https://lavoixdelacentrafrique.wordpress.com/2018/06/18/centrafrique-foot-scaf-leader-du-championnat-de-bangui-a-mi-saison/]
